name: Your "Save The Last Dance" Knowledge : 2 Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: In gym class, who spotted Stasha on the rope climb.
questions.explanation:
Kathy.

	Kathy was told by the gym teacher to spot Stasha on the rope climb, after Diggy had a hard time getting up the rope.

questions.text: At what time did Chenille plan to get back home from Steps?
questions.explanation:
1:00 A.M.

	Chenille tells Mama Dean that she will be getting back home from Steps at 1:00 a.m. at the latest.

questions.text: "They call him Snookie because _____ was taken."
questions.explanation:
Fool.

	Chenille tells Sara this, after Snookie gets mad when Chenille does not introduce him to Sara.

questions.text: What song was playing while Sara was on the phone talking to her friend Lindsay?
questions.explanation:
You.

	This one of the many great songs from the "Save The Last Dance" soundtrack. "You" was prefomed by Lucy Pearl. Other songs from the soundtrack were "Crazy" (K-Ci & JoJo), "Shining Through" (Jill Scott & Fredro Starr-also on the "Save The Last Dance" cast as Malakai), and "U Know What's Up" (Donell Jones).

questions.text: What was the name of Snookie's fifth grade teacher?
questions.explanation:
Ms. Bonnier

	Snookie speaks highly of his fifth grade teacher Ms. Bonnier. He says, "I liked the fifth grade man, Ms. Bonnier had this butt...!"

thugs.

	Chenille does not want Sara walking home in the neighborhood they live in because of the rough atmosphere.

questions.text: Sara's mom always let her eat Swanson's Hungry Man Dinners?
questions.explanation:
False.

	Sara's dad (Roy, played by Terry Kinney) tries to offer her something to eat but Sara says, "I had a big lunch...besides mom never let me eat that stuff."

questions.text:
Finish the quote:
"Who is Snookie talking to?"
"I don't know ____________!"
questions.explanation:
anything with legs.

	Diggy says this funny remark when she and Chenille are walking into Steps and see Snookie talking to some girl.

questions.text: What kind of beer did Sara want at the club?
questions.explanation:
any.

	At the club Sara is getting drinks for herself and Chenille. So she says that she does not know what she wants to drink, so she says she wants any kind of beer.

brilliant.

	Sara says this to Derek when they were in the cafeteria, practicing their dance moves and showing each other how cool they are.
